channel.title: kubernetes on Brain dumps and tech notes
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on Brain dumps and tech notes

item.title: Commands
item.description: Kubectl commands kubectl get pods -A -o wide kubectl run -it new-image --image=alpine kubectl get all -A kubectl top (also top pod and node) kubectl explain pod.spec --recursive kubectl api-versions kubectl auth can-i exec pods --kubeconfig=config kubectl describe pv kubectl describe pv kubectl get storageclass kubectl get apiservice https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/policy/pod-security-policy/ https://pkg.go.dev/sigs.k8s.io/cluster-api#section-readme
